title: Every Christian Lion Hearted Man Will Show You
lyrics:
[Intro]
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
[Verse 1]
"Take this in hand"
Said he who stands
Behind the chair
A broken table there
[Chorus]
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
[Refrain]
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
[Verse 2]
Don't walk so tall
Before you crawl
For every child
Is thinking of something wild

[Chorus]
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
[Refrain]
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
[Chorus]
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you
(Every Christian lion-hearted man will show you)
[Outro]
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
(Oh solo Dominique)
